attributes.action: Unban XL bully's for the dangerous dog list
attributes.additional_details: It's simple if a baby is  brought up around abuse and violence then the baby will grow up to feel like that is what's right as that babys not been brought up any difference It's the same with animals if a animal is brought up to be a fighter or violent looker then that is what the dog will do
attributes.background: I want the government to unban XL bully's and to further look in to the previous owners and lifestyle of the dogs who have attacked people /other animals

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
